name: Post Kudos
tag_list: startups, mobile-apps, testimonials, small-business, customer-reviews, customer-feedback
overview:
Post Kudos is a mobile application designed to make testimonial collection easier for businesses as well as their customers. Clients can submit video testimonials using a mobile device, and businesses can embed the testimonials on their website with a simple code.

Testimonials are such a huge part of closing a sale, but there has never been a convenient way to collect or showcase them. Post Kudos solves this problem, helping business owners, marketing departments and sales professionals collect feedback that is as easy for customers to produce as it is for them to review and display.

The app was created by a team of web consultants who wanted a better way for their clients to acquire, manage and present testimonials, and has proven itself a successful tool in a number of industries and business sectors.
